hero.tagline: We are interested in your success because it means that our strategy is effective
hero.description: International General Trading & Contracting Co. (ICTCO) is an Egyptian corporation company established in 1994. We are one of the leading names in weighing machine equipment and business solutions.

weighingSolutions.title: Weighing Solutions
weighingSolutions.description: This division markets and services Mechanical and Electronic weighing machines such as laboratory balances, Weighbridges, and hazardous area products.

turnkeyProjects.title: Turnkey Projects
turnkeyProjects.description: The Turnkey Projects handled by us involve longer gestation and high-level selling to the government and its agencies.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: This division is responsible for the maintenance of all Electronic Scales with professional technicians and engineers.

softwareSolutions.title: Software Solutions
softwareSolutions.description: ICTCO along with its sister company Millennium started Web Development, Software Development, and Mobile Applications Development.

about.title: About ICTCO
about.description: ICTCO is a multi-product company with a sound financial base. We have varied and wide business interests including investments, manufacturing, turnkey projects, and agency activities. We have a very sound organization with more than 50 employees having varied educational backgrounds and professional skills. ICTCO has a service center that has more than 20 engineers and technicians. about.description1: is an Egyptian corporation company established in 1994. ICTCO is a multi-product company with a sound financial base. We have varied and wide business interests including investments, manufacturing, turnkey projects, and agency activities.
about.description2: Moreover, ICTCO is one of the leading names in weighing machine equipment and business solutions. We have a very sound organization with more than 50 employees having varied educational backgrounds and professional skills.

quality.title: Quality & Certifications
quality.standardsText1: ICTCO is working with a high-quality system and has achieved
quality.standardsText2: worldwide standards for quality. We work closely with our customers on local and international bases.
quality.training: ICTCO always sends its qualified engineers to participate in training courses in UK, Turkey, and U.S.A. So they are always ready for new implementing technologies and developments in all versions.

partners.title: ICTCO is the Sole Agent in Egypt
partners.description: As exclusive representatives of these world-renowned brands, we bring you the finest weighing solutions with full technical support and service.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Explore our events, seminars, and team celebrations

cardinal.title: Cardinal Seminar
cardinal.description: Professional training seminars and workshops conducted with Cardinal Scale Manufacturing Company, showcasing the latest weighing technologies and solutions.

mettler.title: Mettler Toledo Seminar
mettler.description: Advanced technical seminars and training sessions with Mettler Toledo, focusing on precision weighing solutions and laboratory equipment technologies.

team.title: ICTCO Team Celebration
team.description: Our dedicated team celebrations and company events, showcasing the spirit and unity of the ICTCO family throughout our journey of excellence in weighing solutions.

cta.title: Join Our Next Event
cta.description: Stay updated with our latest seminars, training sessions, and company events. Connect with industry experts and enhance your knowledge in weighing technologies.

software.softwareSubtitle: Advanced software solutions for all your weighing system needs

featuresList.dataEntryTitle: Data Entry for All Users, Clients, Vehicles, and Items
featuresList.dataEntryDesc: Comprehensive database management for all weighing operations
featuresList.printCardsTitle: Print Weight Cards with Complete Information
featuresList.reportingDesc: Create reports with the ability to combine multiple search criteria into the same report and export it to Excel. Review stored data and print specific cards that were previously saved.
featuresList.printerDesc: The program can be configured to work with any type of printer (LASER – DESK JET – DOT MATRIX).
featuresList.connectivityDesc: The program automatically works with any weight reading device that has an RS232 serial connection or Ethernet. This solution is available with Access DB.

solutionsList.title: Weighing Management System
solutionsList.desc: Complete solution for managing all weighing operations with real-time data processing and reporting capabilities.

solutionsList.title: Data Collection & Analysis
solutionsList.desc: Advanced data collection tools with statistical analysis and trend reporting for operational insights.

solutionsList.title: Truck Scale Software
solutionsList.desc: Specialized software for truck scale operations with vehicle identification and load management.

solutionsList.title: Quality Control Systems
solutionsList.desc: Statistical quality control software for maintaining product standards and compliance.

solutionsList.title: Remote Monitoring
solutionsList.desc: Cloud-based monitoring solutions for real-time system oversight and maintenance alerts.

software.ctaTitle: Get Started with Our Software Solutions
software.ctaDesc: Contact us to learn more about our software solutions and how they can optimize your weighing operations.

cardinal-swim.name: SWIM Slow-Speed In-Motion Vehicle Scale
cardinal-swim.description: Cardinal Scale's SWIM slow-speed in-motion vehicle scale offers the ideal combination of accuracy, space, speed, and economical price point for weighing fully-loaded semi tractor trailers.
features: Ideal combination of accuracy and speed
Cost-effective means of measuring truck axle and gross weights
Occupies only a small fraction of the space needed for a full-length static truck scale
Perfect for ports, freight terminals, and commercial facilities
Uses four Cardinal SCA Series Stainless Steel Compression Load Cells
Single weighbridge contained in a solid lower frame

specifications.Load Cells: 4 x Cardinal SCA Series Stainless Steel Compression
specifications.Platform: Single weighbridge in solid lower frame

cardinal-armor.name: ARMOR® Series Truck Scales
cardinal-armor.description: ARMOR® series truck scales with steel deck construction and Digital SmartCells for superior durability and accuracy.
features: Steel deck construction for maximum durability

mettler-vts-202-203.name: VTS 202/203
mettler-vts-202-203.description: Mettler Toledo VTS 202/203 weighbridge systems for reliable and accurate truck weighing applications.

radwag-as220-r1-plus.name: AS 220.R1 PLUS Analytical Balance
radwag-as220-r1-plus.description: AS 220.R1 PLUS Analytical Balance is a standard analytical weighing device of the SYNERGY LAB line with exceptional precision and modern features.

radwag-as82-220-x2-plus.name: Radwag AS 82/220.X2 PLUS Analytical Balance
radwag-as82-220-x2-plus.description: Radwag AS 82/220.X2 PLUS analytical balance with advanced features for precision laboratory work.

radwag-ps1000-ri.name: Radwag PS 1000 RI Precision Scale
radwag-ps1000-ri.description: Radwag PS 1000 RI precision scale for accurate weighing in laboratory and industrial applications.

radwag-ps3000-x2.name: Radwag PS 3000 X2 Precision Scale
radwag-ps3000-x2.description: Radwag PS 3000 X2 precision scale with high capacity for demanding weighing applications.

cardinal-805-spectrum.name: 805 Spectrum
cardinal-805-spectrum.description: Advanced digital weighing indicator with comprehensive features for industrial applications.

cardinal-225-navigator.name: Cardinal 225 Navigator Indicator
cardinal-225-navigator.description: The Cardinal 225 Navigator weight indicator provides reliable weight measurement and control with advanced diagnostic technologies.

cardinal-205.name: Cardinal 205 Indicator
cardinal-205.description: The Cardinal 205 weight indicator is a standard industrial indicator offering reliable and proven performance.

cardinal-ac100k.name: Cardinal AC100K Load Cell
cardinal-ac100k.description: The Cardinal AC100K load cell provides high-precision weight measurement for industrial applications.

cardinal-dc100k.name: Cardinal DC100K Load Cell
cardinal-dc100k.description: The Cardinal DC100K load cell is designed for accurate weighing in harsh industrial environments.

baykon-bx66.name: Baykon BX66 Weight Terminal
baykon-bx66.description: The Baykon BX66 weight terminal provides advanced features for industrial applications.

baykon-bx30-fill.name: Baykon BX30 Fill Indicator
baykon-bx30-fill.description: The Baykon BX30 Fill indicator is designed specifically for batch weighing and filling applications.

baykon-bx22s.name: Baykon BX-22 Weight Indicator
baykon-bx22s.description: The Baykon BX-22 weight indicator is suitable for standard industrial applications, offering reliability and durable design.

baykon-br200s.name: Baykon BR200S Pressure Load Cell
baykon-br200s.description: The Baykon BR200S pressure load cell provides high-precision weight measurement for pressure applications.

baykon-bt604.name: Baykon BT604 Tension Load Cell
baykon-bt604.description: The Baykon BT604 tension load cell provides high-precision weight measurement for tension applications.

flintec-ft112.name: Flintec FT-112 Weight Indicator
flintec-ft112.description: The Flintec FT-112 weight indicator is designed for professional industrial applications.

flintec-ft111-panel.name: Flintec FT-111 Panel Indicator
flintec-ft111-panel.description: The Flintec FT-111 Panel indicator is designed for panel mounting with integrated industrial functions.

flintec-ft113-fill.name: Flintec FT-113 Fill Indicator
flintec-ft113-fill.description: The Flintec FT-113 Fill indicator is specialized for batch weighing and filling applications.

flintec-rc3.name: Flintec RC3 Load Cell
flintec-rc3.description: The Flintec RC3 compression load cell provides reliable weight measurement for industrial applications.

flintec-ub6.name: Flintec UB6 Load Cell
flintec-ub6.description: The Flintec UB6 load cell is designed for versatile industrial weighing applications.

flintec-slb.name: Flintec SLB Load Cell
flintec-slb.description: The Flintec SLB load cell is designed for specialized industrial weighing needs.

flintec-sb14.name: Flintec SB14 Load Cell
flintec-sb14.description: The Flintec SB14 load cell is designed for standard industrial weighing applications.

utilcell-740.name: Utilcell 740 Load Cell
utilcell-740.description: The Utilcell 740 load cell provides accurate weighing in industrial environments.
